ke2400 (1.2.0)
++++++++++++++

Keithley IVI Driver for 2450,2460 Source Meters

Supported Instruments
---------------------

    MODEL 2450,
    MODEL 2460,
    MODEL 2461

IVI Compliance
--------------

    IVI-COM/IVI-C Specific Instrument Driver

    :IVI Generation: IVI-2014
    :IVI Instrument Class: None
